DOC.brief_summary: Computed tomographic angiography ( CTA ) important prognostic tool regard detection coronary artery stenosis . Both iodine delivery rate ( IDR ; amount iodine deliver patient per second ) iodine concentration decisive factor opacification arterial vessel . There remain debate literature whether use high iodine concentration contrast medium beneficial compare low iodine concentration . To date , study compare intracoronary attenuation use concentrate contrast medium low 300 mg I/ml coronary CTA . For reliable comparison CM different iodine concentration , adapt injection protocol insure identical IDR ( g iodine per second ) mandatory . The investigator hypothesize usage low iodine concentration , maintain identical IDR total iodine load , result comparable diagnostical intra-vascular attenuation CTA .

DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate intravascular contrast enhancement image quality coronary CTA use different iodine concentration range 240 370 mg iodine per ml , administer identical IDR total iodine load .
